title: Historic Charm Meets Modern Living on Kazimierz Dolny’s Iconic Rynek
description: Step into an enchanting, lovingly restored historic house featuring 4 bright bedrooms and 3 elegant bathrooms. With 197 sqm of thoughtfully designed space and a captivating open floor plan, this unique residence blends classic period details—exposed beams, timeworn stonework—with premium contemporary finishes. Enhanced security systems and a rare EV charging facility bring subtle sophistication, while a generous, inviting dining area flows seamlessly for both living and working.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in the vibrant heart of Rynek—Kazimierz Dolny’s bustling cultural square—this home is surrounded by boutique shops, artisan cafes, and top-tier dining experiences. Though peaceful and delightfully tranquil thanks to its low urban density, Rynek bursts with regular art fairs, music to stroll by, and community charm. Its historic streets offer a perfectly balanced lifestyle between timeless sanctuary and buzzing creativity, easily accessed by nearby highway links.
lifestyle_benefits: Balanced lifestyle in the cultural heart of Kazimierz Dolny
Shopping and artisan dining within steps
Historic ambiance great for creative business meetings
Peaceful, charming neighborhood with eventful weekends
target_buyer: Perfect for entrepreneurially minded individuals or families who appreciate artistic influence and value a harmonious work-life balance. Those seeking inspirational surroundings to fuel their creativity and business ventures will thrive here.
market_positioning: This distinctive historic home sits at the upper end of the market, suited for buyers attracted to Kazimierz Dolny’s cultural and creative pulse, and who require elegant, move-in ready living just minutes from local attractions and main road connections.
